Notes: A small star-shaped ring that slings the player upwards or from one place to another.

Obj_arg0.Name: Speed / Time
Obj_arg0.Description: The speed the sling star slings you at. If a path is assigned, this value is instead used as the time the flight lasts. Default 40 Speed, 300 flight time.

Obj_arg1.Name: Shadow Drop Distance
Obj_arg1.Description: The distance to dtop the shadow. Default 300.

Obj_arg2.Name: One Time Grab
Obj_arg2.Description: If enabled, the sling star will not pull mario towards it more than once. Default false.

Obj_arg3.Name: Camera Count
Obj_arg3.Description: The number of Cameras to be read from the camera file.

Obj_arg5.Name: Unknown
Obj_arg5.Description: Something to do with rotation. Default 0.0f

SW_APPEAR.Description: The object will appear when this switch is activated.

Rail.Description: If used, the flight will follow the path. Arg0 becomes "flight time"
